Take care.\""},{"lineNumber":7208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい…………さよなら」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... goodbye.\""},{"lineNumber":7209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、あとはずっと、おかしをくれるひとの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, after that, I just kept helping the person who gave me sweets."},{"lineNumber":7210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おてつだいでうらなってたの。まぐもぐ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was working for them, munch munch.\""},{"lineNumber":7211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、んんん……そ、そうですか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm, hmm... I don't really get it."},{"lineNumber":7214,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アールコートちゃん、どうだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arco-chan, what do you think?\""},{"lineNumber":7215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「役に立ちそうなことは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anything useful...?"},{"lineNumber":7216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんなさい、おじ様……あと、チルディちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry, uncle... and also, Childy.\""},{"lineNumber":7217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーんだ。べつにいいですわよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. It's fine really."},{"lineNumber":7218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　情報聞き出すためにとお菓子作らされたのも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Being made to bake sweets just to get information was a waste of effort too—"},{"lineNumber":7219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄足でしたけどー」","translatedEnglishLine":"but whatever.\""},{"lineNumber":7220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Auu...\""},{"lineNumber":7221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おねえちゃんのおかし、おいしいよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big sister's sweets are delicious."},{"lineNumber":7222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たっくさん、おかしたべてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"I've eaten so many sweets."},{"lineNumber":7223,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたちがほしょうするの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guarantee that.\""},{"lineNumber":7224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「嬉しくありませんわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That doesn't make me happy.\""},{"lineNumber":7225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、おかわり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, give me seconds!\""},{"lineNumber":7226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう無いッ！　ですわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's none left!\""},{"lineNumber":7227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はー……あったかあったかなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahhh... it's so warm.\""},{"lineNumber":7228,"originalJapaneseLine":"アーシー・ジュリエッタはのんびりと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arcy Julieta was leisurely,"},{"lineNumber":7229,"originalJapaneseLine":"湯に浸かっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"soaking in the hot water."},{"lineNumber":7230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お菓子をたべながらはいりたいくらいだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wish I could eat sweets while soaking, but"},{"lineNumber":7231,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいにくもってないのよねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"unfortunately, I don't have any.\""},{"lineNumber":7232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーい……風呂風呂…………ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... bath, bath... huh?\""},{"lineNumber":7233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら。ランスおにいちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Rance big brother.\""},{"lineNumber":7234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、ガキか。今日はハズレだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, a brat. Today's a miss.\""},{"lineNumber":7235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ううん。大当たりなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No. It's a jackpot.\""},{"lineNumber":7236,"originalJapaneseLine":"言うや、アーシーは立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying that, Arcy stood up."},{"lineNumber":7237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだガキ。もう出るのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's with you, kid? Leaving already?\""},{"lineNumber":7238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah."},{"lineNumber":7239,"originalJapaneseLine":"　らんすおにいちゃん、すごい巡り合わせなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance big brother, it's an amazing coincidence.\""},{"lineNumber":7240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":7241,"originalJapaneseLine":"アーシーは、そそくさと風呂から上がっていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arcy hastily got out of the bath."},{"lineNumber":7242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだあいつ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the heck is that guy...\""},{"lineNumber":7243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どわっ！？　モンスター！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa!? A monster!?\""},{"lineNumber":7244,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然、空からモンスターが降ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, a monster fell from the sky."},{"lineNumber":7245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここは……？　あ、いや。貴様はカオスマスター！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where is this...? Ah, no. You are the Chaos Master!"},{"lineNumber":7246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くたばれーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Dieeee!\""},{"lineNumber":7247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、人が風呂に浸かってる時にー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, attacking someone who's in the bath!?"},{"lineNumber":7248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………って、武器！」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Wait, a weapon!\""},{"lineNumber":7249,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは腰に手を当てて、自分が全裸であることを","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance put his hand on his hip and once again realized he was completely naked."},{"lineNumber":7250,"originalJapaneseLine":"改めて実感した。","translatedEnglishLine":"He fully felt it once more."},{"lineNumber":7251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふはははは！　これは僥倖！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahahaha! What a stroke of luck!"},{"lineNumber":7252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭をカチ割って…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll smash your head...!\""},{"lineNumber":7253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pfft!\""},{"lineNumber":7254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おひょーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ohhyoooo!\""},{"lineNumber":7255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、よーーーーし！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, all right!"},{"lineNumber":7256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぶちころーーーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll kill you!\""},{"lineNumber":7257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……往生際の悪い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... you're stubborn to the end!\""},{"lineNumber":7258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ……あんなめにあうのもすごいし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... it's amazing to go through something like that,"},{"lineNumber":7259,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでいきのこるのもすごい」","translatedEnglishLine":"and even more amazing to survive it.\""},{"lineNumber":7260,"originalJapaneseLine":"腰に手を当てて限定物のフルーツ牛乳を飲み干すと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Putting a hand on his hip, he drank down a limited edition fruit milk,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるじさまのことばは、いつもだれにも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord's words were always misunderstood by everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: りかいできなかったのね。
ちがうのはガイさまくらい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only one who got it was Lord Guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……恐らくは、今生の別れか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... this is probably our farewell in this life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらばだ、娘達」
「……そうなのか」
「そうだろうね。達者で」
「はい…………さよなら」
「で、あとはずっと、おかしをくれるひとの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, after that, I just kept helping the person who gave me sweets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おてつだいでうらなってたの。まぐもぐ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was working for them, munch munch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、んんん……そ、そうですか……
ありがとうございました……」
「なんか……よく分からん。
アールコートちゃん、どうだ？」
「役に立ちそうなことは……
ごめんなさい、おじ様……あと、チルディちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, uncle... and also, Childy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーんだ。べつにいいですわよー。
情報聞き出すためにとお菓子作らされたのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being made to bake sweets just to get information was a waste of effort too—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄足でしたけどー」
「おねえちゃんのおかし、おいしいよ。
たっくさん、おかしたべてきた
あたちがほしょうするの」
「嬉しくありませんわ」
「だから、おかわり！」
「もう無いッ！　ですわ！」
「はー……あったかあったかなの」
アーシー・ジュリエッタはのんびりと、
湯に浸かっていた。
「お菓子をたべながらはいりたいくらいだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wish I could eat sweets while soaking, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいにくもってないのよねー」
「ふーい……風呂風呂…………ん？」
「あら。ランスおにいちゃん」
「ちっ、ガキか。今日はハズレだな」
「…………ううん。大当たりなの」
言うや、アーシーは立ち上がる。
「なんだガキ。もう出るのか」
「うん。
らんすおにいちゃん、すごい巡り合わせなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance big brother, it's an amazing coincidence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アーシーは、そそくさと風呂から上がっていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arcy hastily got out of the bath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだあいつ……」
「どわっ！？　モンスター！？」
突然、空からモンスターが降ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a monster fell from the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは……？　あ、いや。貴様はカオスマスター！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where is this...? Ah, no. You are the Chaos Master!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くたばれーーー！」
「ええい、人が風呂に浸かってる時にー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, attacking someone who's in the bath!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは腰に手を当てて、自分が全裸であることを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance put his hand on his hip and once again realized he was completely naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて実感した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He fully felt it once more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふはははは！　これは僥倖！
頭をカチ割って…………！」
「ぽいっ」
「おひょーーー！」
「がははは、よーーーーし！
ぶちころーーーす！」
「くっ……往生際の悪い！」
「はぁ……あんなめにあうのもすごいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... it's amazing to go through something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでいきのこるのもすごい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even more amazing to survive it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腰に手を当てて限定物のフルーツ牛乳を飲み干すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting a hand on his hip, he drank down a limited edition fruit milk,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるじさまのことばは、いつもだれにも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord's words were always misunderstood by everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: りかいできなかったのね。
ちがうのはガイさまくらい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only one who got it was Lord Guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……恐らくは、今生の別れか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... this is probably our farewell in this life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらばだ、娘達」
「……そうなのか」
「そうだろうね。達者で」
「はい…………さよなら」
「で、あとはずっと、おかしをくれるひとの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, after that, I just kept helping the person who gave me sweets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おてつだいでうらなってたの。まぐもぐ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was working for them, munch munch."

「役に立ちそうなことは……
ごめんなさい、おじ様……あと、チルディちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, uncle... and also, Childy."

情報聞き出すためにとお菓子作らされたのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being made to bake sweets just to get information was a waste of effort too—

たっくさん、おかしたべてきた
あたちがほしょうするの」
「嬉しくありませんわ」

らんすおにいちゃん、すごい巡り合わせなの」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a monster fell from the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは……？　あ、いや。貴様はカオスマスター！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where is this...? Ah, no. You are the Chaos Master!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くたばれーーー！」
「ええい、人が風呂に浸かってる時にー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, attacking someone who's in the bath!?

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance put his hand on his hip and once again realized he was completely naked.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He fully felt it once more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふはははは！　これは僥倖！
頭をカチ割って…………！」

ぶちころーーーす！」

「はぁ……あんなめにあうのもすごいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... it's amazing to go through something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでいきのこるのもすごい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even more amazing to survive it."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting a hand on his hip, he drank down a limited edition fruit milk,
